channel.title: Projects on Michael Kochell
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Michael Kochell

item.title: Portfolio
item.description: Here are some projects I have worked in the past couple of years. Some are personal projects, and some are projects from school. Jam App Repo: https://gitlab.com/mjkochell/jam-app A music application used to make playing music and improvising with others easier. It allows users to build progressions on the fly and distribute them among other members’ devices to visually show the structure of what is to come. It also sends midi information to instruments and allows the user to control which notes should be held out.
